text: Tommy DeVito (June 19, 1928 - September 21, 2020) was an American musician. He was best known as a founding member, singer, and lead guitarist of the rock band The Four Seasons. DeVito died on September 21, 2020 in Las Vegas, Nevada from COVID-19 at the age of 92.Tommy DeVito, original Four Seasons member, dies of COVID-19 at 92 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Nevada Category:American rock singers Category:American rock guitarists Category:American pop singers Category:American pop musicians Category:Singers from New Jersey Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:The Four Seasons (band) members
title: Tommy DeVito (musician)
